 Listen. All my shouting isn't getting my counter point across so 
listen. I spent a large amount of my vacation comming up with the 
"around the world" and I'd hate to feel I wasted my time. Their are 
no requirements for a ship at all and any illegal technology he might 
find will take more power than is at his disposal. At the end of the 
story a Rocak computer will tell him he can only be part Rocak when 
they need him so he turns back to normal until they call again(hey 
after a while the part Rocak stuff would get boring). Will it make 
you any happier if I tell you I won't do anymore on that story until 
I finish with the "Mutants". I will finish with this story,but it 
won't totally crush me if you decide it's null and void. Just say 
it's part OOC(he he he). Further more I haven't gotten an answer 
about if you'll settle for weekly posts on my part after scholl starts
(it's my Freshman year for goodness sake).
